resources.string: Click on https://github.com/byoutline/SecretSauce or click here to see toast

This localized string comes from "ResourceDependency" class that was created by Dagger.\n Its background color is also set to value from different dependency. Since this background color is Theme dependent you can verify that this is indeed activity context by navigating to next activity that uses same dependency class, but has different color.
Second activity has different theme so Dagger dependency has loaded different color.
Tap to open activity with different theme
Tap to open activity from different Gradle module
